```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```
    

```{r}
water <- read_csv("data/waterdata.csv", show_col_types = FALSE )
city <- read_csv("data/mcdonald_1.csv", show_col_types = FALSE )
population <- read_csv("data/world_populations_data.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)

```

```{r}
city_pop <- city %>%
  left_join(population, by = c("City_Name" = "Name",
                               "Country_Name" = "Country"))
```

```{r}
sum(is.na(city_pop$Population))
```
